title: Currently on a 6 game win streak and currently 12:4 with Volibear
body:
I think i'm doing well enough that I can start giving out advice on the freelo bear. Any questions just ask. 

Note: I'm only in silver II (climbing hella fast with this guy)

replies.body: Always been a bear fan... unfortunately any good ranged carry top will wreck him.  I played against a bear the other day as Swain and he could do nothing against me.
Luckily people are too hyped in this tank meta to even realize that. I nearly shit myself when I have to pick before the enemy top laner and i'm praying it's not a quinn or vayne or gnar etc.

voli is known to me only as "MURDERBEAR"

for obvious reasons.
It fits even better in this TP meta where nobody is carrying ignite..now he can literally murder everyone xD
